```{r setup, include=FALSE}
#Import files
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
source("bp.R", local = knitr::knit_global())

#Variable Declaration

#Data
filepath = "./YearReport.csv"
x_axis = "Year"
y_axis = "Quota"

#Layout
colors = c("#004D9A","#002142","#0069D2","#0180FF","#4FA7FF")
Symbol = 1
#0, square
#1, circle
#2, triangle point up
#3, plus
#4, cross
#5, diamond
#6, triangle point down
#7, square cross
#8, star
#9, diamond plus
#10, circle plus
#11, triangles up and down
#12, square plus
#13, circle cross
#14, square and triangle down
#15, filled square
#16, filled circle
#17, filled triangle point-up
#18, filled diamond
#19, solid circle
#20, bullet (smaller circle)
#21, filled circle 
#22, filled square 
#23, filled diamond 
#24, filled triangle point-up 
#25, filled triangle point down 
```

## File Check
```{r file_import, echo=FALSE}
file_exists <- file.exists(filepath)
if(file_exists){
print("File succesful imported")
}
if(!file_exists){
print("File not found")
}
print(file_exists)
```


## Scatter Plot
```{r scatter, echo=FALSE}
scatter(filepath, x_axis, y_axis, colors[1])
```

## Line Plot
```{r line, echo=FALSE}
line(filepath, x_axis, y_axis, colors[1], colors[2])
```

## Horizontal Bar Plot
```{r horbar, echo=FALSE}
bar(filepath, x_axis, y_axis ,TRUE, FALSE, colors[1])
```

## Vertical Bar Plot
```{r verbar, echo=FALSE}
bar(filepath, x_axis, y_axis ,FALSE, FALSE, colors[1])
```

## Stacked Bar Plot
```{r stacked, echo=FALSE}
bar(filepath, x_axis, y_axis ,FALSE, TRUE, colors[1])
```
